SugarwiseApp // ======= onbnoarding ======== Hi!
Welcome Scan Your Foods
 Daily Report of
Your_Food Sugar Warning
Consumption Start manage your sugar intake with SugarWise for making informed and mindful choices about your sweet indulgences. You can easily enter the type of food you consume using the camera feature to detect it automatically View your daily report based on all the food you consumed that day. We will provide graphs that help you monitor your daily reports We will give you a warning when the amount of sugar you have consumed exceeds the maximum daily sugar consumption limit for humans Gambar seekor koala yang menyapa anda Gambar seekor koala yang memegang handphone untuk melakukan scan makanan Gambar seekor koala yang menunjuk ke arah suatu statistik pada papan tulis Gambar seekor koala yang memegang papan peringatan Sign In Continue Get Started Welcome!
